channel.title: CVE Feed for Crafter Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Crafter Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-23258|2024-08-03T19:05:54.504Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Authenticated users with Administrator or Developer roles may execute OS commands by SPEL Expression in Spring beans. SPEL Expression does not have security restrictions, which will cause attackers to execute arbitrary commands remotely (RCE).

item.title: CVE-2021-23264|2024-08-03T19:05:55.692Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Installations, where crafter-search is not protected, allow unauthenticated remote attackers to create, view, and delete search indexes.

item.title: CVE-2022-40635|2024-08-03T12:21:46.555Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources vulnerability in Crafter Studio of Crafter CMS allows authenticated developers to execute OS commands via Groovy Sandbox Bypass.

item.title: CVE-2021-23262|2024-08-03T19:05:55.627Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Authenticated administrators may modify the main YAML configuration file and load a Java class resulting in RCE.

item.title: CVE-2021-23265|2024-08-03T19:05:55.468Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: A logged-in and authenticated user with a Reviewer Role may lock a content item.

item.title: CVE-2021-23260|2024-08-03T19:05:55.371Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Authenticated users with Site roles may inject XSS scripts via file names that will execute in the browser for this and other users of the same site.

item.title: CVE-2022-40634|2024-08-03T12:21:46.586Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources vulnerability in Crafter Studio of Crafter CMS allows authenticated developers to execute OS commands via FreeMarker SSTI.

item.title: CVE-2021-23261|2024-08-03T19:05:55.482Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Authenticated administrators may override the system configuration file and cause a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2021-23259|2024-08-03T19:05:54.517Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Authenticated users with Administrator or Developer roles may execute OS commands by Groovy Script which uses Groovy lib to render a webpage. The groovy script does not have security restrictions, which will cause attackers to execute arbitrary commands remotely(RCE).

item.title: CVE-2021-23267|2024-08-03T19:05:55.429Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources vulnerability in Crafter Studio of Crafter CMS allows authenticated developers to execute OS commands via FreeMarker static methods.

item.title: CVE-2021-23263|2024-08-03T19:05:54.887Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Unauthenticated remote attackers can read textual content via FreeMarker including files /scripts/*, /templates/* and some of the files in /.git/* (non-binary).

item.title: CVE-2021-23266|2024-08-03T19:05:55.457Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: An anonymous user can craft a URL with text that ends up in the log viewer as is. The text can then include textual messages to mislead the administrator.
